string.base: Migrating feature states from related applications
string.translation: Prijenos stanja osobina iz povezanih programa

string.base: Specify a network location for the server image of the product.
string.translation: Navedi mrežnu lokaciju slike poslužitelja proizvoda.

string.base: Enter the network location or click Change to browse to a location. Click Install to create a server image of [ProductName] at the specified network location or click Cancel to exit the wizard.
string.translation: Unesite mrežnu lokaciju ili pritisnite Promijeni za pretraživanje do lokacije. Pritisnite Instaliraj za stvaranje slike poslužitelja [ProductName] na navedenoj mrežnoj lokaciji ili pritisnite Odustani za izlaz iz carobnjaka.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will create a server image of [ProductName] at a specified network location. To continue, click Next.
Are you sure you want to cancel [ProductName] installation?
string.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite odustati od instalacije [ProductName]?

string.base: Select the program features you want installed.
string.translation: Odaberite programske osobine koje želite instalirati .

string.base: Click on an icon in the list below to change how a feature is installed.
string.translation: Pritisnite na ikonu sa donjeg popisa za promjenu nacina instalacije osobine.

string.base: Multiline description of the currently selected item
string.translation: Opis u više redaka trenutno odabrane stavke

string.base: Custom Setup allows you to selectively install program features.
string.translation: Korisnicka instalacija Vam omogucava da programske osobine instalirate selektivno.

string.base: Will be installed on first use. (Available only if the feature supports this option.)
string.translation: Ce biti instalirano kod prve upotrebe. (Dostupno samo ako osobina podržava tu opciju.)

string.base: This install state means the feature...
string.translation: This install state means the feature...

string.base: Will be completely installed to the local hard drive.
string.translation: Will be completely installed to the local hard drive.

string.base: The icon next to the feature name indicates the install state of the feature. Click the icon to drop down the install state menu for each feature.
string.translation: Ikona pored naziva osobine oznacava status instalacije te osobine. Pritisnite na ikonu da biste došli do izbornika statusa instalacije za svaku osobinu.

string.base: Will be installed to run from the network. (Available only if the feature supports this option.)
string.translation: Biti ce instalirano za pokretanje sa mreže. ( Dostupno samo ako osobina podržava tu opciju.)

string.base: Will have some subfeatures installed to the local hard drive. (Available only if the feature has subfeatures.)
string.translation: Imati ce instalirane neke podosobine na Vaš lokalni disk. ( Dostupno samo ako osobina podržava tu opciju.)

string.base: Click Next to install to this folder, or click Change to install to a different folder.
string.translation: Pritisnite Dalje za ninstalaciju u ovu mapu, ili pritisnite Promijeni za instalaciju u drugu mapu.

string.base: The disk space required for the installation of the selected features.
string.translation: Diskovni prostor potreban za instalaciju odabranih osobina.

string.base: The highlighted volumes do not have enough disk space available for the currently selected features. You can remove files from the highlighted volumes, choose to install less features onto local drives, or select different destination drives.
string.translation: Oznacene jedinice nemaju dovoljno dostupnog diskovnog prostora za trenutno odabrane osobine. Sa oznacenih jedinica može ukloniti datoteke, odaberite manje osobina za instalaciju na lokalne jedinice, ili odaberite druge odredišne jedinice.

string.base: Some files that need to be updated are currently in use.
string.translation: Neke datoteke koje treba obnoviti su trenutno u uporabi.

string.base: The following applications are using files that need to be updated by this setup. Close these applications and click Retry to continue.
string.translation: Slijedeci programi koriste datoteke koje trebaju biti obnovljene u ovoj instalaciji. Zatvorite te programe i pritisnite Ponovi za nastavak.

string.base: WARNING: This program is protected by copyright law and international treaties.
string.translation: UPOZORENJE: Ovaj je racunalni program zašticen autorskim pravom i medunarodnim ugovorima.

string.base: Setup will install [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Next.
Please read the following license agreement carefully.
string.translation: Molimo pažljivo procitajte slijedeci licencni ugovor.

string.base: I &do not accept the terms in the license agreement
I &accept the terms in the license agreement
Modify, repair, or remove the program.
Change which program features are installed. This option displays the Custom Selection dialog in which you can change the way features are installed.
string.translation: Promijeni koje su osobine programa instalirane. Ova opcija prikazuje dijalog Korisnickog odabira u kojem možete izmijeniti nacin na koji su osobine instalirane.

string.base: Repair installation errors in the program. This option fixes missing or corrupt files, shortcuts, and registry entries.
string.translation: Popravi instalacijske pogreške u programu. Ova opcija popravlja nedostajuce ili oštecene datoteke, shortcuts, and registry entries.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will allow you to modify, repair, or remove [ProductName]. To continue, click Next.
Disk space required for the installation exceeds available disk space.
string.translation: Prostor na disku potreban za instalaciju prelazi velicinu raspoloživog prostora na disku.

string.base: The highlighted volumes do not have enough disk space available for the currently selected features. You can remove files from the highlighted volumes, choose to install less features onto local drives, or select different destination drives.
string.translation: Oznacene jedinice nemaju dovoljno dostupnog diskovnog prostora za trenutno odabrane osobine. Sa oznacenih jedinica može ukloniti datoteke, odaberite manje osobina za instalaciju na lokalne jedinice, ili odaberite druge odredišne jedinice.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will install the Patch for [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Update.
The wizard is ready to begin installation.
Click Install to begin the installation.
If you want to review or change any of your installation settings, click Back. Click Cancel to exit the wizard.
string.translation: Ako želite pregledati ili promijeniti postavke za instalaciju, pritisnite Nazad. Pritisnite Odustani za izlaz iz carobnjaka.

string.base: You have chosen to remove the program from your system.
string.translation: Odabrali ste uklanjanje programa sa svog sustava.

string.base: Click Remove to remove [ProductName] from your computer. After removal, this program will no longer be available for use.
string.translation: Pritisnite Ukloni za uklanjanje [ProductName] sa Vašeg sustava. Nakon uklanjanja taj program više nece biti dostupan za upotrebu.

string.base: If you want to review or change any settings, click Back.
string.translation: Ako želite pregledati ili promijeniti postavke za instalaciju, pritisnite Nazad.

string.base: Your system has not been modified. To complete installation at another time, please run setup again.
string.translation: Vaš sustav nije izmijenjen. Za dovršenje instalacije drugom prilikom, molimo ponovo pokrenite instalacijski program.

string.base: Click Finish to exit the wizard.
string.translation: Pritisnite Završi za izlaz iz carobnjaka.

string.base: You can either keep any existing installed elements on your system to continue this installation at a later time or you can restore your system to its original state prior to the installation.
string.translation: Možete ili zadržati postojece instalirane elemente na Vašem sustavu das biste instalaciju nastavili kasnije ili možete vratiti Vaš sustav u njegovo izvorno stanje prije instalacije.

string.base: Click Restore or Continue Later to exit the wizard.
string.translation: Pritisnite Obnovi ili Nastavi kasnije za izlaz iz carobnjaka.

string.base: The wizard was interrupted before [ProductName] could be completely installed.
string.translation: Carobnjak je prekinut prije nego je [ProductName] mogao biti u potpunosti instaliran.

string.base: The Setup Wizard has successfully installed [ProductName]. Click Finish to exit the wizard.
&Yes, check for program updates (Recommended) after the setup completes.
string.translation: &Da, provjeri obnove programa (Preporuća se) po dovršetku instalacije.

string.base: The Setup Wizard has successfully uninstalled [ProductName]. Click Finish to exit the wizard.
Some program files might have been updated since you purchased your copy of [ProductName].
string.translation: Neke su programske datoteke možda obnovljene od kada ste kupili svoj primjerak [ProductName].

string.base: Your Internet connection can be used to make sure that you have the latest updates.
string.translation: Pomoću vaše Internet veze možete provjeriti da li imate najnovije obnove.

string.base: <error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here>
string.translation: <ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške><ovdje dolazi tekst greške>

string.base: [ProductName] Setup is preparing the Setup Wizard which will guide you through the program setup process. Please wait.
Your system has not been modified. To install this program at a later time, please run the installation again.
string.translation: Vaš sustav nije bio izmijenjen. Za instalaciju ovog programa kasnije, molim ponovo pokrenite instalaciju.

string.base: Click Finish to exit the wizard.
string.translation: Pritisnite Završi za izlaz iz carobnjaka.

string.base: You can either keep any existing installed elements on your system to continue this installation at a later time or you can restore your system to its original state prior to the installation.
string.translation: Možete ili zadržati postojece instalirane elemente na Vašem sustavu das biste instalaciju nastavili kasnije ili možete vratiti Vaš sustav u njegovo izvorno stanje prije instalacije.

string.base: Click Restore or Continue Later to exit the wizard.
string.translation: Pritisnite Obnovi ili nastavi kasnije za izlaz iz carobnjaka.

string.base: The wizard was interrupted before [ProductName] could be completely installed.
string.translation: Carobnjak je prekinut prije nego je [ProductName] mogao biti potpuno instaliran.

string.base: The program features you selected are being installed.
string.translation: Programske osobine koje ste odabrali biti ce instalirane.

string.base: Please wait while the Setup Wizard installs [ProductName]. This may take several minutes.
Please wait while the Setup Wizard uninstalls [ProductName]. This may take several minutes.
The program features you selected are being uninstalled.
string.translation: Programske osobine koje ste odabrali biti ce deinstalirane.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will complete the installation of [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Next.
The Setup Wizard will complete the suspended installation of [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Next.
Choose the setup type that best suits your needs.
string.translation: Odaberite tip instalacije koja najbolje odgovara Vašim potrebama.

string.base: All program features will be installed. (Requires the most disk space.)
string.translation: Sve osobine programa ce biti instalirane. (Potrebno više diskovnog prostora.)

string.base: Choose which program features you want installed and where they will be installed. Recommended for advanced users.
string.translation: Odaberite koje osobine želite da budu instalirane i gdje da budu instalirane. Preporucuje se za napredne korisnike.

string.base: Out of memory. Shut down other applications before retrying.
string.translation: Nema dovoljno memorije. Prije ponovnog pokušaja zatvorite druge programe.

string.base: Removing older versions of this application
Preparing to remove older versions of this application
string.translation: Priprema za uklanjanje starih inacica ovog programa ...

string.base: Error reading from file: [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Pogreška u citanju izb datoteke: [2]. {{ Sistemska greška [3].}} Provjerite da datoteka postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Cannot create the file [3]. A directory with this name already exists. Cancel the installation and try installing to a different location.
string.translation: Nije moguce stvoriti datoteku [3]. Imenik sa tim imenom vec postoji. Odustanite od instalacije i pokušajte instalaciju na drugu lokaciju.

string.base: The installer has insufficient privileges to access this directory: [2]. The installation cannot continue. Log on as an administrator or contact your system administrator.
string.translation: Installer nema dovoljne ovlasti za pristup tom imeniku: [2]. Instalacija se ne može nastaviti. Prijavite se kao administrator ili se obratite administratoru sustava.

string.base: Error writing to file [2]. Verify that you have access to that directory.
string.translation: Pogreška u pisanju u datoteku [2]. Provjerite da li imate pristup tom imeniku.

string.base: Error reading from file [2]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Pogreška u citanju iz datoteke [2]. Provjerite da datoteka postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Another application has exclusive access to the file [2]. Please shut down all other applications, then click Retry.
string.translation: Drugi program ima iskljucivo pravo pristupa datoteci [2]. Molim zatvorite sve druge programe i zatim pritisnite Ponovi.

string.base: There is not enough disk space to install the file [2]. Free some disk space and click Retry, or click Cancel to exit.
string.translation: Nema dovoljno diskovnog prostora za instalaciju datoteke [2]. Oslobodite nešto diskovnog prostora i pritisnite Ponovi, ili pritisnite Odustani za izlaz.

string.base: Source file not found: [2]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Izvorna datoteka nije nadena: [2]. Provjerite da datoteka postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Error reading from file: [3]. {{ System error [2].}} Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Pogreška u citanju iz datoteke: [3]. {{ Sistemska greška [2].}} Provjerite da datoteka postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Error writing to file: [3]. {{ System error [2].}} Verify that you have access to that directory.
string.translation: Pogreška writing to file: [3]. {{ Sistemska greška [2].}} Provjerite da imate pristup tom imeniku.

string.base: Source file not found{{(cabinet)}}: [2]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Izvorišna datoteka mnije nadena{{(cabinet)}}: [2]. Provjerite da datoteka postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Cannot create the directory [2]. A file with this name already exists. Please rename or remove the file and click Retry, or click Cancel to exit.
string.translation: Nije moguce naciniti imenik [2]. Datoteka s tim nazivom vec postoji. Molim preimenujte ili uklonite datoteku i pritisnite Ponovi, ili pritisnite Odustani za izlaz.

string.base: The volume [2] is currently unavailable. Please select another.
string.translation: Disk je trenutacno nedostupan. Molim odaberite drugi.

string.base: Unable to write to the specified folder [2].
string.translation: Nije moguce pisanje u navedenu mapu [2].

string.base: A network error occurred while attempting to read from the file [2]
string.translation: Mrežna pogreška je nastala prilikom pokušaja citanja iz datoteke [2]

string.base: An error occurred while attempting to create the directory [2]
string.translation: Pogreška je nastala prilikom pokušaja stvaranja imenika [2]

string.base: A network error occurred while attempting to create the directory [2]
string.translation: Mrežna pogreška je nastala prilikom pokušaja stvaranja imenika [2]

string.base: A network error occurred while attempting to open the source file cabinet [2].
string.translation: A network pogreška je nastala prilikom pokušaja otvaranja izvorišne kabinet-datoteke [2].

string.base: The specified path is too long [2].
The Installer has insufficient privileges to modify the file [2].
string.translation: Installer nema dovoljne ovlasti za izmjenu datoteke [2].

string.base: A portion of the path [2] exceeds the length allowed by the system.
string.translation: Dio puta [2] prelazi dužinu koju dopušta sustav.

string.base: The path [2] contains words that are not valid in folders.
string.translation: Put [2] sadrži rijeci koje su nevaljane u mapama.

string.base: The path [2] contains an invalid character.
[2] is not a valid short file name.

string.translation: Pogreška pri dobivanju informacija o sigurnosti datoteke: [3] GetLastError: [2]

string.base: Error applying patch to file [2]. It has probably been updated by other means, and can no longer be modified by this patch. For more information contact your patch vendor. {{System Error: [3]}}
string.translation: Greška applying patch to datoteku[2]. Ona je vjerojatno ažurirana nekim drugim nacinom, pa se više ne može mijenjati ovim ispravkom. Želite li više obavijesti kontaktirajte svojeg prodavaca ispravke. {{Sistemska greška: [3]}}

string.base: Could not create key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce stvoriti kljuc [2]. {{ Sistemska greška [3].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not open key: [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce otvoriti kljuc: [2]. {{ Sistemska greška [3].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not delete value [2] from key [3]. {{ System error [4].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce izbrisati vrijednost [2] iz kljuca [3]. {{ Sistemska greška [4].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not delete key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce izbrisati kljuc [2]. {{ Sistemska greška [3].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not read value [2] from key [3]. {{ System error [4].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce ocitati vrijednost [2] iz kljuca [3]. {{ Sistemska greška [4].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not write value [2] to key [3]. {{ System error [4].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce upisati vrijednost [2] u kljuc [3]. {{ Sistemska greška [4].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not get value names for key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce doviti vrijednosti naziva za kljuc [2]. {{ Sistemska greška [3].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not get sub key names for key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce get sub kljuc names for kljuc [2]. {{ Sistemska greška [3].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not read security information for key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce citati informacije o sigurnosti za kljuc [2]. {{ Sistemska greška [3].}} Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pristup tom kljucu, ili se obratite osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not increase the available registry space. [2] KB of free registry space is required for the installation of this application.
string.translation: Nije se mogao povecati dostupan prostor u registru. [2] KB slobodnog prostora u registru potrebno za instalaciju tog programa.

string.base: Another installation is in progress. You must complete that installation before continuing this one.
string.translation: Druga instalacija je u toku. Morate završiti tu instalaciju prije nego nastavite s ovom.

string.base: Error accessing secured data. Please make sure the Windows Installer is configured properly and try the installation again.
string.translation: Pogreška prilikom pristupa zašticenim podacima. Molimo provjerite je li Windows Installer ispravno konfiguriran i pokušajte instalaciju ponovo.

string.base: User [2] has previously initiated an installation for product [3]. That user will need to run that installation again before using that product. Your current installation will now continue.
string.translation: Korisnik [2] prethodno je zapoceo instalaciju proizvoda [3]. Taj ce korisnik morati ponovo izvesti tu instalaciju prije korištenja tog proizvoda. Vaša trenutacna instalacija sada ce se nastaviti.

string.base: User [2] has previously initiated an installation for product [3]. That user will need to run that installation again before using that product.
string.translation: Korisnik [2] prethodno je zapoceo instalaciju proizvoda [3]. Taj ce korisnik morati ponovo izvesti tu instalaciju prije korištenja tog proizvoda.

string.base: Out of disk space -- Volume: '[2]'; required space: [3] KB; available space: [4] KB. Free some disk space and retry.
string.translation: Nema prostora na disku -- Volumen: '[2]'; potreban prostor: [3] KB; dostupan prostor: [4] KB. Oslobodite nešto diskovnog prostora i pokušajte ponovo.

string.base: Are you sure you want to cancel?
string.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite odustati?

string.base: The file [2][3] is being held in use{ by the following process: Name: [4], ID: [5], Window Title: [6]}. Close that application and retry.
string.translation: Datoteku [2][3] koristi{ by the following process: Name: [4], ID: [5], Window Title: [6]}. Zatvorite taj program i pokušajte ponovo.

string.base: The product [2] is already installed, preventing the installation of this product. The two products are incompatible.
string.translation: Proizvod [2] koji je vec instaliran, sprijecava instalaciju ovog proizvoda. Ta dva proizvoda nisu kompatibilna.

string.base: Out of disk space -- Volume: [2]; required space: [3] KB; available space: [4] KB. If rollback is disabled, enough space is available. Click Cancel to quit, Retry to check available disk space again, or Ignore to continue without rollback.
string.translation: Nema dovoljno diskovnog prostora -- Volumen: [2]; potreban prostor: [3] KB; dostupan prostor: [4] KB. Ako se onesposobi vracanje neažuriranih podataka, bit ce dovoljno prostora. Za izlaz pritisnite 'Odustani', za ponovnu provjeru diskovnog prostora 'Ponovi', a za nastavak bez mogucnosti vracanja 'Zanemari za nastavak vracanja neažuriranih podataka.
Nije bilo moguce pristupiti mrežnoj lokaciji [2].

string.base: The following applications should be closed before continuing the installation:
string.translation: Prije nastavka instalacije moraju biti zatvoreni sljedeci programi:

string.base: Could not find any previously installed compliant products on the machine for installing this product.
string.translation: Nije moguce pronaci nijedan prethodno instaliran uskladivi program na racunalu potreban za instaliranje ovog proizvoda.

string.base: The key [2] is not valid. Verify that you entered the correct key.
string.translation: Kljuc [2] nije valjan. Provjerite da li ste unijeli pravilan kljuc.

string.base: The installer must restart your system before configuration of [2] can continue. Click Yes to restart now or No if you plan to restart later.
string.translation: The installer must ponovo pokrenuti Vaš sustav prije nego se konfiguracija [2] može nastaviti. Pritisnite Da za ponovo pokretanje sada, ili Ne ako ponovo pokretanje planirate kasnije.

string.base: You must restart your system for the configuration changes made to [2] to take effect. Click Yes to restart now or No if you plan to restart later.
string.translation: Morate ponovo pokrenuti Vaš sustav da bi konfiguracijske promijene [2] stupile na snagu. Pritisnite Da za ponovo pokretanje sada, ili Ne ako ponovo pokretanje planirate kasnije.

string.base: An installation for [2] is currently suspended. You must undo the changes made by that installation to continue. Do you want to undo those changes?
string.translation: Instalacija za [2] je trenutacno obustavljena. Morate poništiti promijene koje je ucinila ta instalacija za nastavak. Da li želite poništiti te promijene?

string.base: A previous installation for this product is in progress. You must undo the changes made by that installation to continue. Do you want to undo those changes?
string.translation: Prethodna instalacija za taj proizvod je u tijeku. Morate poništiti promijene koje je ucinila ta instalacija za nastavak. Da li želite poništiti te promijene?

string.base: No valid source could be found for product [2]. The Windows Installer cannot continue.
string.translation: Nije naden valjan izvor za proizvod [2]. Windows Installer ne može nastaviti.

string.base: You may either restore your computer to its previous state or continue the installation later. Would you like to restore?
string.translation: Možete ili vratiti svoje racunalo u prvotno stanje, ili nastaviti instalaciju kasnije. Želite li vratiti u prvotno stanje?

string.base: An error occurred while writing installation information to disk. Check to make sure enough disk space is available, and click Retry, or Cancel to end the installation.
string.translation: Pogreška se javila prilikom pisanja instalacijskih informacija na disk. Provjerite da li ima dovoljno dostupnog diskovnog prostora, i pritisnite Ponovi, ili Odustani za prekid instalacije.

string.base: One or more of the files required to restore your computer to its previous state could not be found. Restoration will not be possible.
string.translation: Jednu ili više datoteka potrebnih za vracanje vašeg racunala u prethodno stanje nije moguce pronaci. Vracanje nece biti moguce.

string.base: [2] cannot install one of its required products. Contact your technical support group. {{System Error: [3].}}
string.translation: [2] ne može instalirati jedan od obveznih proizvoda. Kontaktirajte svoju grupu za tehnicku podršku. {{Sistemska greška: [3].}}

string.base: The older version of [2] cannot be removed. Contact your technical support group. {{System Error [3].}}
string.translation: Starija inacica [2] ne može biti uklonjena. Kontaktirajte svoju grupu za tehnicku podršku. {{Sistemska greška [3].}}

string.base: The path [2] is not valid. Please specify a valid path.
string.translation: Put [2] nije valjan. Molim navedite valjan put.

string.base: Out of memory. Shut down other applications before retrying.
string.translation: Out of memory. Shut down other applications before retrying.

string.base: There is no disk in drive [2]. Please insert one and click Retry, or click Cancel to go back to the previously selected volume.
string.translation: Nema diskete u jedinici [2]. Molimo umetnite je i pritisnite Ponovi, ili pritisnite Odustani za povratak na prethodno oznaceni medij.

string.base: There is no disk in drive [2]. Please insert one and click Retry, or click Cancel to return to the browse dialog and select a different volume.
string.translation: Nema diskete u jedinici [2]. Molimo umetnite je i pritisnite Ponovi, ili pritisnite Odustani kako biste se vratili u dijalog pregleda i oznacili drugi medij.

string.base: The folder [2] does not exist. Please enter a path to an existing folder.
string.translation: Mapa [2] ne postoji. Molim unesite put za postojecu mapu.

string.base: You have insufficient privileges to read this folder.
string.translation: Nemate dovoljno prava za citanje ove mape.

string.base: A valid destination folder for the installation could not be determined.
string.translation: Valjana odredišna mapa za instalaciju nije se mogla odrediti.

string.base: Error attempting to read from the source installation database: [2].
string.translation: Pogreška u pokušaju citanja iz izvorišne instalacijske baze podataka: [2].

string.base: Scheduling reboot operation: Renaming file [2] to [3]. Must reboot to complete operation.
string.translation: Predvidanje postupka ponovnog pokretanja racunala: Preimenovanje datoteke [2] u [3]. Da bi se operacija dovršila racunalo se mora ponovo pokrenuti.

string.base: Scheduling reboot operation: Deleting file [2]. Must reboot to complete operation.
string.translation: Predvidanje postupka ponovnog pokretanja racunala: Brisanje datoteke [2]. Da bi se operacija dovršila racunalo se mora ponovo pokrenuti.

string.base: Module [2] failed to register. HRESULT [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Modul [2] nije se uspio registrirati. HRESULT [3]. Obratite se osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Module [2] failed to unregister. HRESULT [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Modul [2] nije se uspio odjaviti. HRESULT [3]. Obratite se osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Failed to cache package [2]. Error: [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije uspio zapis paketa [2]. Pogreška: [3]. Obratite se osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not register font [2]. Verify that you have sufficient permissions to install fonts, and that the system supports this font.
string.translation: Nije moguce prijaviti font [2]. Provjerite imate li dovoljne dozvole za instaliranje fontova, i da sustav podržava taj font.

string.base: Could not unregister font [2]. Verify that you have sufficient permissions to remove fonts.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce odjaviti font [2]. Provjerite imate li dovoljna odobrenja za uklanjanje fontova.

string.base: Could not create shortcut [2]. Verify that the destination folder exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce naciniti precac [2]. Provjerite da odredišna mapa postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Could not remove shortcut [2]. Verify that the shortcut file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Nije moguce ukloniti precac [2]. Provjeri da postoji datoteka precaca i da joj se može priszupiti.

string.base: Could not register type library for file [2]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce prijaviti vrstu biblioteke za datoteku [2]. Obratite se osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not unregister type library for file [2]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce odjaviti vrstu biblioteke za datoteku [2]. Obratite se osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Could not update the INI file [2][3]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce update the INI datoteku[2][3]. Provjerite da datoteka postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Could not schedule file [2] to replace file [3] on reboot. Verify that you have write permissions to file [3].
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce predvidjeti da datoteka [2] zamijeni datoteku [3] kod ponovnog podizanja sustava. Provjerite da imate dopuštenje za upis u tu datoteku [3].

string.base: Error removing ODBC driver manager, ODBC error [2]: [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Greška pri uklanjanju ODBC upravitelja upravljackih programa, ODBC greška [2]: [3]. Obratite se osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Error installing ODBC driver manager, ODBC error [2]: [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Greška kod instaliranja ODBC upravitelja upravljackih programa, ODBC greška [2]: [3]. Obratite se osoblju za podršku.

string.base: Error removing ODBC driver [4], ODBC error [2]: [3]. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to remove ODBC drivers.
string.translation: Greška kod uklanjanja ODBC upravljackog programa [4], ODBC greška [2]: [3]. Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava ukloniti ODBC upravljackih programa.

string.base: Error installing ODBC driver [4], ODBC error [2]: [3]. Verify that the file [4] exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Greška kod instaliranja ODBC upravljackog programa [4], ODBC greška [2]: [3]. Provjerite da datoteka [4] postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Error configuring ODBC data source [4], ODBC error [2]: [3]. Verify that the file [4] exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Greška kod konfiguriranja ODBC izvora podataka [4], ODBC greška [2]: [3]. Provjerite da datoteka [4] postoji i da joj možete pristupiti.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) failed to start. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to start system services.
string.translation: Servis [2] ([3]) nije uspio pokretanje. Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za pokretanje sistemskog servisa.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) could not be stopped. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to stop system services.
string.translation: Servis [2] ([3]) nije bilo moguce zaustaviti. Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za zaustavljanje servisa.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) could not be deleted. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to remove system services.
string.translation: Servis [2] ([3]) nije bilo moguce be deleted. Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za ukloniti servise sustava.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) could not be installed. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to install system services.
string.translation: Servis [2] ([3]) nije bilo moguce instalirati. Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za instalirati servise sustava.

string.base: Could not update environment variable [2]. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to modify environment variables.
string.translation: Nije bilo moguce ažurirati varijablu okoline [2]. Provjerite imate li dovoljna prava za izmjenu varijabli okoline.

string.base: You do not have sufficient privileges to complete this installation for all users of the machine. Log on as an administrator and then retry this installation.
string.translation: Nemate dovoljno prava za dovršenje te instalacije za sve korisnike racunala. Prijavite se kao administrator i zatim ponovno pokušajte tu instalaciju.

string.base: Could not set file security for file [3]. Error: [2]. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to modify the security permissions for this file.
string.translation: Nije moguce postaviti sigurnost datoteke za datoteku [3]. Greška: [2]. Provjerite imate li dovoljno dozvola za promjenu sigurnosnih dozvola za ovu datoteku.

string.base: Component Services (COM+ 1.0) are not installed on this computer. This installation requires Component Services in order to complete successfully. Component Services are available on Windows 2000.
string.translation: Komponentni servisi (COM+ 1.0) nisu instalirani na ovom racunalu. Ova instalacija zahtijeva komponentne servise kako bi bila uspješno završena. Komponentni servisi su dostupni na Windows 2000.

string.base: Error registering COM+ application. Contact your support personnel for more information.
string.translation: Greška kod prijave COM+ programa. Obratite se osoblju za podršku za više podataka.

string.base: Error unregistering COM+ application. Contact your support personnel for more information.
string.translation: Greška u odjavi COM+ programa. Obratite se osoblju za podršku za više podataka.

string.base: The description for service '[2]' ([3]) could not be changed.
string.translation: Opis za servis '[2]' ([3]) nije bilo moguce promijeniti.

string.base: The Windows Installer service cannot update the system file [2] because the file is protected by Windows. You may need to update your operating system for this program to work correctly. {{Package version: [3], OS Protected version: [4]}}
string.translation: Servis Windows Installer ne može ažurirati zašticenu datoteku Windowsa [2] jer ju je zaštitio Windows. Možda morate ažurirati operacijski sustav kako bi taj program radio ispravno. {{Inacica paketa: [3], OS zašticena inacica: [4]}}

string.base: The Windows Installer service cannot update the protected Windows file [2]. {{Package version: [3], OS Protected version: [4], SFP Error: [5]}}
string.translation: Servis Windows Installer ne može ažurirati zašticenu datoteku Windowsa [2]. {{Inacica paketa: [3], OS zašticena inacica: [4], SFP Pogreška: [5]}}

string.base: The Windows Installer service cannot update one or more protected Windows files. SFP Error: [2]. List of protected files: [3]
string.translation: Servis Windows Installer ne može ažurirati jednu ili više zaštićenih Windows datoteka. SFP Pogreška: [2]. Popis zaštićenih datoteka: [3]

string.base: User installations are disabled via policy on the machine.
string.translation: Korisničke instalacije su onemogućene policom na ovom stroju.

string.base: This feature will not be available.
This feature will be installed when required.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana kada bude potrebno.

string.base: This feature, and all subfeatures, will be installed to run from the CD.
string.translation: Ova osobina i sve podosobine biti ce instalirane i pokretane sa CD-a.

string.base: This feature, and all subfeatures, will be installed on local hard drive.
string.translation: Ova osobina i sve podosobine biti ce instalirane na lokalnom tvrdom disku.

string.base: This feature, and all subfeatures, will be installed to run from the network.
string.translation: Ova osobina i sve podosobine biti ce instalirane i pokretane sa mreže.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from CD.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana za pokretanje sa CD.

string.base: This feature will be installed on local hard drive.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana sa lokalnog tvrdog diska.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from network.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana za pokretanje sa mreže.

string.base: This feature will be set to be installed when required.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti postavljena za instalaciju prema potrebi.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from CD.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana za pokretanje sa CD-a.

string.base: This feature will be installed on the local hard drive.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana na lokalmom disku.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from the network.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana za pokretanje sa mreže.

string.base: This feature will be available to run from CD.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti dostupna za pokretanje sa CD-a.

string.base: This feature will be installed on your local hard drive.
string.translation: Ova osobina biti ce instalirana na Vaš lokalni disk.

string.base: This feature will be available to run from the network.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti dostupna za pokretanje sa mreže.

string.base: This feature will be uninstalled completely, and you won't be able to run it from CD.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti potpuno deinstalirana, i necete ju moci pokrenuti sa CD-a.

string.base: This feature was run from the CD but will be set to be installed when required.
string.translation: Ta osobina je bila pokretana sa CD-a, ali ce biti postavljena za instalaciju prema potrebi.

string.base: This feature will continue to be run from the CD
string.translation: Ta osobina ce i nadalje biti za pokretanje sa CD-a

string.base: This feature was run from the CD but will be installed on the local hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina je bila pokretana sa CD-a, ali ce biti instalirana na vaš lokalni disk.

string.base: This feature frees up [1] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina oslobada [1] na Vašem disku.

string.base: This feature requires [1] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina requires [1] na Vašem disku.

string.base: This feature will be completely removed.
string.translation: Ta osobina will be completely removed.

string.base: This feature will be removed from your local hard drive but will be set to be installed when required.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti uklonjena sa Vašeg lokalnog diska, ali ce biti postavljena za instalaciju prema potrebi.

string.base: This feature will be removed from your local hard drive but will still be available to run from CD.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti uklonjena sa Vašeg lokalnog diska, ali ce biti još dostupna za pokretanje sa CD-a.

string.base: This feature will remain on your local hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce ostati na Vašem lokalnom disku.

string.base: This feature will be removed from your local hard drive, but will be still available to run from the network.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti uklonjena sa Vašeg lokalnog diska, ali ce biti još dostupna za pokretanje sa mreže.

string.base: This feature will be uninstalled completely, and you won't be able to run it from the network.
string.translation: Ta osobina ce biti potpuno deinstalirana, i necete ju moci pokrenuti sa mreže.

string.base: This feature was run from the network but will be installed when required.
string.translation: Ta osobina je bila pokretana sa mreže, ali ce biti postavljena za instalaciju prema potrebi.

string.base: This feature was run from the network but will be installed on the local hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina je pokrenuta sa mreže ali ce biti instalirana na lokalnom disku.

string.base: This feature will continue to be run from the network
string.translation: Ta osobina ce i dalje biti pokretana sa mreže

string.base: This feature frees up [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures free up [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina oslobada [1] na Vašem disku. Ona ima [2] od [3] odabrane podosobine. Podosobine oslobadaju [4] na Vašem disku.

string.base: This feature frees up [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures require [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina oslobada [1] na Vašem disku. Ona ima [2] od [3] odabrane podosobine. Podosobine trebaju [4] na Vašem disku.

string.base: This feature requires [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures free up [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina zahtijeva [1] na Vašem disku. Ona ima [2] od [3] podosobine odabrane. Podosobine oslobadaju [4] na Vašem disku.

string.base: This feature requires [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures require [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta osobina requires [1] na Vašem disku. It has [2] of [3] podosobine odabrane. Podosobine zahtijevaju [4] na Vašem disku.
